abstract:
Memorandum  
February 29, 2008
To:
Directors of Museums, Research Centers, and Educational Programs
From:
Richard Kurin
cc:
Cristián Samper, Alison McNally, Ned Rifkin, Ira Rubinoff, Tom Ott, Evelyn 
Lieberman, 
Ginny Clark, Ann Speyer, Archives and Digital Asset Managers
Re:
Call for Digital Images for Flickr Project
The Smithsonian will provide approximately 2,000 digital photographic images to Flickr, a 
popular photo-sharing website, as part of a pilot project. Our decision follows the succe
